mapper.sql: id, topic_title, user_id, topic_picture, topic_describe, create_time, `level`, topic_participations
mapper.select: select t.id, t.topic_title, t.topic_picture, t.topic_describe, t.topic_participations, t.create_time, t.level, u.id as user_id, u.nick_name, u.head_image from test_bbs.t_topic t, test_bbs.t_user u where t.user_id = u.id and t.id = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into t_topic (id, topic_title, user_id, topic_picture, topic_describe, create_time, `level`, topic_participations) values (#{id}, #{topicTitle}, #{userId}, #{topicPicture}, #{topicDescribe}, #{createTime}, #{level}, #{topicParticipations})
mapper.update: update t_topic set topic_title = #{topicTitle}, user_id = #{userId}, topic_picture = #{topicPicture}, topic_describe = #{topicDescribe}, create_time = #{createTime}, `level` = #{level}, topic_participations = #{topicParticipations} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select t.id, t.topic_title, t.topic_picture, t.topic_describe, t.topic_participations, t.create_time, t.level, u.id as user_id, u.nick_name from test_bbs.t_topic t, test_bbs.t_user u where t.user_id = u.id and t.level=0;

select t.id, t.topic_title, t.topic_picture, t.topic_describe, t.topic_participations, t.create_time, t.level, u.id as user_id, u.nick_name from test_bbs.t_topic t, test_bbs.t_user u where t.user_id = u.id and t.level=1;

select t.id, t.topic_title, t.topic_picture, t.topic_describe, t.topic_participations, t.create_time, t.level, u.id as user_id, u.nick_name from test_bbs.t_topic t, test_bbs.t_user u where t.user_id = u.id;
